text: Kamaghɨn kɨ ghaze, kɨ gumazir kaba amadaghtɨ me faragh izɨ ian ganɨva, ian akuragh dagɨar ia danɨngasa akam akɨriziba, dar akɨrigh da amadaghtɨ da mangam. Eghtɨ kɨ izamin dughiamɨn, gumaziba ian gantɨ, ia bar akuegh dagɨar kabar anɨngam. Egh me kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan kogham, e men dagɨaba okɨmasa me gifari. Puvatɨ.
